product_name: Klean Kanteen Stainless-Steel Pint Cup - 16 fl. oz. - Package of 4
long_description: Put down the plastic and pick up a Klean Kanteen Stainless-Steel Pint cup. Cups are made of tough 18/8 food-grade stainless steel that is BPA free and dishwasher safe; steel won't retain or impart flavors. Rugged stainless steel won't break like glass. Cups are stackable and easily transportable. Laser-etched Klean Kanteen logo won't wear off. Dishwasher safe. Package includes 4 Klean Kanteen Stainless-Steel Pint cups.
short_description: Put down the plastic and pick up a Klean Kanteen Stainless-Steel Pint cup.
